= biOps Installation Guide =
This page describes how to install [http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/biOps/index.html biOps], an image processing package, on R.

= Windows =
 # Start R.
 # Type the following command in R console.
{{{
> install.packages("biOps")
> library(biOps)
}}}
That is it.

[RImageBookInstallationEn#Windows Proceed to RImageBook installation].

= Linux =
The following explanation is for Ubuntu Linux. biOps depends on libfftw3,libtiff, and libjpeg.
 # Install there libraries by typing the following command in Terminal.
{{{
$ sudo apt-get install libfftw3-dev libtiff4-dev libjpeg62-dev
}}}
 # Start R and install biOps.
{{{
$ sudo R
> install.packages("biOps")
> library(biOps)
}}}


[RImageBookInstallationEn#Linux Proceed to RImageBook installation].

= Mac OS =
This is for Leopard, Snow Leopard, and Lion.
biOps depends on libfftw3, libtiff, and libjpeg.
 # Install these libraries by typing the following command in Terminal.
{{{
$ sudo port install fftw-3 tiff jpeg
}}}
 # Create symbolic links to the libraries.
{{{
$ cd /usr/include
$ sudo ln -s /opt/local/include/fftw3.h
$ for x in /opt/local/include/j*.h; do sudo ln -s $x; done
$ for x in /opt/local/include/tiff*.h; do sudo ln -s $x; done
$ cd /usr/lib
$ for x in /opt/local/lib/libfftw3.*; do sudo ln -s $x; done
$ for x in /opt/local/lib/libjpeg.*; do sudo ln -s $x; done
$ for x in /opt/local/lib/libtiff.*; do sudo ln -s $x; done
}}}
 # Start R and install biOps from the source file.
{{{
$ sudo R
> install.packages("biOps", repos="http://cran.md.tsukuba.ac.jp/", type="source")
> library(biOps)
}}}

[RImageBookInstallationEn#Mac_OS Proceed to RImageBook installation].
